test_classes.description: Unit tests for remediation story type detection logic
Unit tests for discovering blocked validation stories
Unit tests for test overlap calculation integration
Unit tests for reconciliation mode determination
Unit tests for reconciliation application functions
Integration tests for complete remediation testing trigger workflow
Integration tests for error handling in reconciliation workflow
Integration tests for reconciliation result reporting

key_tests: test_propagate_mode_end_to_end - Verifies complete propagate workflow from remediation testing to validation completion
test_retest_mode_end_to_end - Verifies complete retest workflow from remediation testing to validation unblocking
test_failed_remediation_tests_skip_reconciliation - Ensures failed tests do not trigger reconciliation
test_non_remediation_story_skips_reconciliation - Ensures non-remediation stories don't trigger workflow
test_apply_propagate_marks_validation_completed - Validates propagate function marks validation as completed
test_apply_retest_unblocks_validation - Validates retest function unblocks validation
coverage_notes: Comprehensive coverage of unit and integration scenarios
Error handling and edge cases tested
